tool_description: Listen to more 50,000 Radio Stations from all around the world and know what song is playing in real-time.All Stations are updated Daily and More and More Radios are added to the API as soon as discovered.
name: Radio World - 50,000 Radios Stations
title: Radio World - 50,000 Radios Stations

api_list.name: Get Genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radio-world-50-000-radios-stations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/genres/getAll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radio-world-50-000-radios-stations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
